title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5004.7 - Charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5004.7 - Charges

State Regulations
(a) The service
charge on each loan issued shall be $30. (b) The service charge fund shall be the fund
established to administer service charges. (c) A loan payment shall be considered
delinquent when it is 10 days past due and for each such payment a $10 charge
shall be added to the loan. A loan payment must be paid in full in order not to
be considered delinquent. (d) A
charge of $20 shall be made for each dishonored check sent in payment of a
loan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5004.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
